function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient monitoring data for contagious diseases","Impact":"Inability to mount effective responses, increased public distrust and anxiety, potential for misinformation and conspiracy theories","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous testing and contact tracing, establish credibility and transparency, ensure public safety and trust","Technologies":"Analytical testing methods, contact tracing technology","People":"General public, healthcare workers, law enforcement, voters","Owner":"Governments, public health authorities, law enforcement"}]}
